author: Universal Pictures
description:
Sheriff Buford T. Justice (Jackie Gleason) unknowingly sits next to the Bandit (Burt Reynolds) at a diner. As the Sheriff demands "a Diablo sandwich and a Dr Pepper" while ranting about his chase, the Bandit listens in, staying completely unnoticed in this hilarious, tension-filled moment.

Buy/Rent Smokey and the Bandit!
